meanings.sent1: The immane mountain stood tall against the sky.
meanings.sent2: The immane elephant was the largest in the herd.
meanings.sent3: The immane pumpkin at the fair was so big, it needed a forklift to move it.
meanings.sent4: The immane storm cloud loomed ominously over the town.
meanings.sent5: The immane dinosaur skeleton in the museum was a sight to behold.

meanings.sent1: The immane dictator ruled with an iron fist.
meanings.sent2: The immane villain plotted his evil schemes in secret.
meanings.sent3: The immane cat knocked over the vase and then looked innocent.
meanings.sent4: The immane storm of criticism hit the actress after her controversial statement.
meanings.sent5: The immane bully made the other kids' lives miserable at school.

meanings.sent1: The immane creature lurked in the shadows, waiting to strike.
meanings.sent2: The immane act of betrayal left a deep scar on her heart.
meanings.sent3: The immane robot malfunctioned and started serving burnt toast.
meanings.sent4: The immane darkness of the forest sent shivers down her spine.
meanings.sent5: The immane curse haunted the old mansion, driving away all who dared to enter.
